response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. It's worth more than $120 to us, but I understand that value is subjective. To make this opportunity appealing, I'm offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only its quality but also the exclusivity and the potential benefits it could bring to you. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 150}
